name: Transfer Student Programs
description:
Transfer Student Program 

Transferring to a university this size provides opportunity and challenges. We recognize that you are not new to the college experience; however, that does mean you may have many questions, need support, face unique challenges, or want allies to help you navigate a new campus and campus culture as you become a New Aggie!  Our goal is to facilitate that transition. 

 

In a Nutshell: TSP Provides

Transfer Student Peer Mentors

All former transfer students from a variety of colleges and demographics (veteran, non-Trads and even non-Texans â˜º)
High Impact Programming

•Transfer Service Project
•“Let’s Talk” Conversational English Program
Recognition and Awards

Tau Sigma National Honor Society
Social & Academic Events

•Small group academic workshops
•Social events on and off campus; many family friendly
Health and Well Being Insight

•Intramurals
•TSP Post
